title: Send a document API technical guide
description: Use this service to attach documents to your application.
templateContent: how use send document api this consists two endpoints that must used together upload single post v0 documents url generate endpoint http body request contains information about file being uploaded put documentcapture.landregistry.gov.uk .. bytes making create will result following items returned: upload_url make only valid ten minutes after generation timed from start neither size nor speed internet connection cause timeout document_id unique id included application submission payload returned above should contain content 200 code successful asynchronously virus scanned validated issues found during process surfaced via modify received response validation rules pass follow guidance implementing below types four are supported by hmlr upload: pdfs password protected tiffs gifs pngs any other fail length sha 256 part expects file_length file_sha256 parameters these refer values also provided when headers: : &ltvalue file_length&gt x amz checksum sha256 file_sha256&gt where x&gt were given match either receive signature verification failure 403 maximum permitted 40mib 41943040 see examples different languages: python with open &quot test.pdf&quot rb&quot f: file_bytes = f.read len bash du b test.pdf java f new long filelength f.length javascript node const fs require fs&quot stats statsync base64 encoded bit binary digest exactly 44 characters regardless several hash b64encode .digest cat | \ openssl enc byte data files.readallbytes messagedigest digester messagedigest.getinstance 256&quot digester.update string filesha256 base64.getencoder .encodetostring digester.digest crypto crypto&quot shasum createhash sha256&quot update getbytes base64&quot example requests responses { data&quot document_type&quot tr1&quot file_length&quot 6362 file_sha256&quot xhepsrlehdpshynpjwwarzerivlcpvn8f8pycs7crqa=&quot } upload_url&quot 04c5c3fe aa08 473b 9944 64ef5506f8e2&quot document_id&quot note: may representative actual matches 4xx
